alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 13 at 3:38PM CDT until October 14 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
